name: Dot's Maze Of Pain Remastered
description:
dot's maze of pain is a remake of the first original game I ever made if you want to play the original dot's maze of pain click here

dot's maze of pain remastered is the definitive version of dot's maze of pain

modes:

definitive mode - the definitive mode for the definitive version (click to where you want to go to move but if you touch a wall you get teleported to the start of the maze)

normal mode - the original controls from the older game (this mode can also be controlled with D-pad on a controller)
